import dataiku
dataiku.set_remote_dss("http://localhost:11200/", "j6IDfFQCkCEXNtUEURRI7kReQhoS4WIB")

def api_py_function(deployment):
    client = dataiku.api_client()
    apideployer = client.get_apideployer()
    project = client.get_project(dataiku.default_project_key())
    api_infrastructure_id = apideployer.list_infras()[0].id

    # Get the API service
    deployment_id = apideployer.get_deployment(deployment).deployment_id
    deployment = apideployer.get_deployment(deployment_id)
    deployment_status = deployment.get_status().get_health_messages()
